price: Anaasε Ɔde mmaa ne mmarima kabom (dekyε obi a Ɔpε); obi a Ɔpε nso Ɔyε no bonini. Nokorε sε Ɔne Onimdefoͻ, Ɔne Otumfoͻ a Ɔhyehyε biribiara.
arabic: أَوۡ يُزَوِّجُهُمۡ ذُكۡرَانٗا وَإِنَٰثٗاۖ وَيَجۡعَلُ مَن يَشَآءُ عَقِيمًاۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٞ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: aw yuzawwijuhum dhuk'rānan wa-ināthan wayajʿalu man yashāu ʿaqīman innahu ʿalīmun qadīrun
